summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2413, for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, from North 77th Street to North 85th Street; and North 78th Street, from East Green Lake Boulevard to Meridian Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 25358 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
